title: The Witcher 3 is not an RPG

media:group.media:title: The Witcher 3 is not an RPG
media:group.media:description:
This is most certainly my most controversial video to date...

Despite being a few months late, this video was rushed to get out way ahead of Cyberpunk - probably will end up all being for naught when it gets delayed until 2022.

If I made any mistakes, be sure to let me know in the comments.

Daggerfall Unity: https://www.dfworkshop.net/

All of The Witcher 3's Side Quests: https://witcher.fandom.com/wiki/The_Witcher_3_secondary_quests

Contents:
Introduction - 00:00
The History of RPGs - 4:26
So What Exactly is an RPG? - 16:59
Character Progression/Combat - 20:16
Open World Design - 23:38
Character Leveling - 27:05
Quest Design - 29:30
Story Decisions - 34:12
The "36" Endings - 39:37
The DLCs - 43:24
Conclusion - 46:05
